pr_title: [smhi] Add aggregated channels for daily forecast.

timeline.message:
Add aggregated channels for daily forecast.

Also updates to use Optionals instead of @Nullables, and add unit tests

Signed-off-by: Anders Alfredsson <andersb86@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why did you change this to a custom unit calculation? Same for below.
timeline.author: fwolter

replies.bodyText: When testing out the binding, I noticed that the values returned from the Item didn't keep the unit that the QuantityType was created with (some with m/s and some with mm/h), but instead used the default, which is km/h for Number:Speed-Items. Since all other types seemed to work correctly (even the Number:Length-Items where some have km an some mm for unit oddly enough) I thought it had something to to with the predefined composite units, so tried to set it explicitly. Forgot to revert afterwards.
replies.author: pacive

timeline.message:
Revert unsing explicit unit definition

Signed-off-by: Anders Alfredsson <andersb86@gmail.com>
